export function Home() { const products = useProducts() const counts = Math.ceil(products.length / 5); // Calculate the number of rows needed console.log(counts) return (
New Products
{[...Array(counts)].map((_, index) => (
{products.slice(index * 5, (index + 1) * 5).map((product) => (

Alensio

{/* Stars */}

(102)

{/* Info */}

{product.name}

{product.price}

See Details
))}
))}
); }
